name: Mediator
description:
As the personification of faith in reconciliation, become the impersonal mediator and prevent various conflicts from getting escalated!

Face siblings fighting for a lollipop, football fans and superpowers on the verge of a nuclear conflict. How long will you be able to keep the peace?

Made in 48-hours in the theater by Sebastian Krzyszkowiak and Konrad Burandt.
